name: PATH (puffy.jelly)
description:
PATH

PATH is a game made in under 24 hours for the 72 hour COVID Game jam hosted by RwhalGames.

You must guide your player, who walks ONLY on a path, drawn between dots by the player.

Click on the PATH and SHIELD texts to switch between placing them.

The play can also place SHIELD blockades, which halt the spread of an incoming virus.

Due to time constraints and my joining another game jam, I had to complete this game in a mere 24 hours! I kind of liked the idea however, so I might return to this prototype in the future. But sorry for only a few levels, lack of polish, and no music!
